title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog should be shown even if dataset is not set
OB: An error is shown instead of displaying the group dialog when trying to create a new table group without setting the dataset.
EB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, the user should be able to go and define a group. The group dialog should be displayed regardless of whether or not the dataset is defined.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
3. Observe if the group dialog is displayed or if an error is shown.
